Item 7.01 - Regulation FD Disclosure.content: On August 21, 2024, Microsoft Corporation posted presentation materials to the Investor Relations section of its website titled “Fiscal Year 2025 Investor Metrics.” A copy of the presentation materials is furnished as Exhibit 99.1 to this report. In accordance with General Instruction B.2 of Form 8-K, the information in this Item 7.01 and Exhibit 99.1, shall not be deemed to be “filed” for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the “Exchange Act”), or otherwise subject to the liability of that section, and shall not be incorporated by reference into any registration statement or other document filed under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such filing.
